meanings.definition: A small freshwater fish native to the Americas.
meanings.sent1: Gambusias swim gracefully in the river.
meanings.sent2: I saw a school of gambusias in the pond.
meanings.sent3: The gambusias had a party in their underwater castle.
meanings.sent4: Her room was like a tank full of colorful gambusias.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the vibrant gambusias.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'gambusia'.
meanings.sent1: Look at all the gambusias in the aquarium!
meanings.sent2: The gambusias are popular pets among fish enthusiasts.
meanings.sent3: The gambusias gathered for a meeting to discuss their name.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with gambusias, a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The gambusias swam together in perfect harmony.
